original_text: So Ahab went up to eat and to drink. And Elijah went up to the top of Mount Carmel. And he bowed himself down on the earth and put his face between his knees.
korean_text: 아합이 먹고 마시러 올라가니라 엘리야가 갈멜 산 꼭대기로 올라가서 땅에 꿇어 엎드려 그의 얼굴을 무릎 사이에 넣고

sentences.original_text: So Ahab went up to eat and to drink.
And Elijah went up to the top of Mount Carmel.
And he bowed himself down on the earth
and put his face between his knees.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 얼굴을 무릎 사이에 넣었습니다.
